actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight, Investigations, and Accountability.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To provide for citizen engagement on the development and adoption of Federal civilian agency use of artificial intelligence, and for other purposes.
